s1.ptxt: Check that all door locks are released and all doors are closed.
With remote controller of which ID code is registered in keyless start control module carried with yourself, check that pushing driver door request switch once locks all doors.
Check that pushing request switch of driver door, passenger door or rear end door once releases corresponding door lock.
Check that pushing again request switch pushed in Step 3) releases all door locks.

attention3.ptxt: If door of which request switch has been pushed is opened/closed before performing Step 4), all door locks will not be released even when Step 4) is performed. If Step 4) is performed after door is opened/closed, only the door of which request switch was pushed will be locked.
